A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had great hopes for this movie. However\, I felt that I didn't learn anything interesting about the Jedi story or anything else. The stories behind the characters were flat -- nothing special or surprising. It seams that the Star Wars movies have only turned into a superficial franchise offering no depth on storytelling and zero creative imagination -- wondering if it is why the critics score is so different from the audience and fans. And I agree with many of the reviewers\, it is the worse Star Wars movie ever!
